attributes.action: Ensure that all MPs have a free vote in Parliament.The present system allows an autocratic PM whi dictate his/her will on the people of Great Britain.This is not DEMOCRACY>
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it mandatory in British Law to ensure that all MPs have a free vote in Parliament. . MPs are voted for by ordinary voters,who are promised the earth prior to elections.It is not democratic that a Prime Minister can dictate his personal will on MPs,thereby denying the simple right of voters to an outcome of their choice - as in hanging,membership of the EU,pensioners pensions,English MPs voting for English laws,as opposed to Scottish Mps voting for laws affecting England;but not vice versa etc., Immigrants,health,prisons,yobs,under age drinking,the carrying of knives and on and on and on......

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
